short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to take quick notes and set reminders. Made by RTBRuhan

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing an effortlessly convenient tool: a browser extension designed specifically for seamless note-taking and reminder setting within your browser. Simplify your workflow, enhance productivity, and keep track of important tasks with ease. Experience the power of staying organized right at your fingertips!
